nodes.documentation: @title Interface that voters must use to Vote on price request resolutions.
nodes.name: VotingInterface
commitVote
revealVote

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the queries that are being voted on this round.
nodes.name: getPendingRequests

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the current vote phase (commit or reveal) based on the current block time.
nodes.name: getVotePhase

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the current vote round id based on the current block time.
nodes.name: getCurrentRoundId

nodes.documentation: @notice Retrieves rewards owed for a set of resolved price requests.
nodes.name: retrieveRewards

nodes.documentation: @title Interface that voters must use to Vote on price request resolutions.
nodes.name: VotingInterface
commitVote
revealVote

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the queries that are being voted on this round.
nodes.name: getPendingRequests

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the current vote phase (commit or reveal) based on the current block time.
nodes.name: getVotePhase

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the current vote round id based on the current block time.
nodes.name: getCurrentRoundId

nodes.documentation: @notice Retrieves rewards owed for a set of resolved price requests.
nodes.name: retrieveRewards

commitVote(bytes32,uint256,bytes32).details: (`identifier`, `time`) must correspond to a price request that's currently in the commit phase. `hash` should be the keccak256 hash of the price you want to vote for and a `int salt`. Commits can be changed.

revealVote(bytes32,uint256,int256,int256.details: The revealed `price` and `salt` must match the latest `hash` that `commitVote()` was called with. Only the committer can reveal their vote.

devdoc.title: Interface that voters must use to Vote on price request resolutions.

commitVote(bytes32,uint256,bytes32).notice: Commit your vote for a price request for `identifier` at `time`.

getCurrentRoundId().notice: Gets the current vote round id based on the current block time.

getPendingRequests().notice: Gets the queries that are being voted on this round.

getVotePhase().notice: Gets the current vote phase (commit or reveal) based on the current block time.

retrieveRewards(uint256,(bytes32,uint256.notice: Retrieves rewards owed for a set of resolved price requests.

revealVote(bytes32,uint256,int256,int256.notice: Reveal a previously committed vote for `identifier` at `time`.
